text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/payment-issuertype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient PatientThe patient or a party issuing payment on behalf of the patient.
insurance InsuranceAn insurer, or party acting on their behalf, which is making payment following a contract, direct or indirect, with the patient to pay for healthcare-related services.

name: PaymentIssuerTypeCodes
title: Payment Issuer Type Codes
description: This value set contains codes for the type of payment issuers.

concept.definition: The patient or a party issuing payment on behalf of the patient.
An insurer, or party acting on their behalf, which is making payment following a contract, direct or indirect, with the patient to pay for healthcare-related services.
